content_sanitizer_injection.details: All prompt injection patterns detected correctly

content_sanitizer_html.details: HTML tags and JavaScript properly stripped

secret_redaction.details: OpenAI keys, GitHub tokens, JWTs, and database URLs properly redacted

trust_zones.details: Content quarantine and trust level resolution working correctly

memory_provenance.details: Memory provenance tracking and trust level enforcement working

policy_ssrf.details: SSRF protection for localhost, private IPs, and cloud metadata working

policy_confirmations.details: Confirmation requirements for shell, browser, and external operations working

kill_switch.details: Kill switch blocks all tool execution when enabled

lockdown_mode.details: Lockdown mode enforces strict confirmations correctly

llm_router.details: LLM router returns valid models and handles task routing correctly

claude_optional.details: System can run without Claude dependency

cost_controls.details: Cost controls track token usage and enforce budget limits correctly
